roleset.name: to prevent or defeat

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Kryuchkov was quoted as saying that in place of the infamous 5th Directorate a new unit would work `` to foil the conspiracies of foreign intelligence services to create and use organized anti - government groups in our country . ''

propbank.arg: the conspiracies of foreign intelligence services to create and use organized anti - government groups in our country

example.name: curses! foiled again!
example.text: Foiled in their effort to get a national ban , the egg producers turned their attention to the states .

propbank.arg: in their effort to get a national ban

roleset.note: FOIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'foil' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from foil.01-v predicate notes)
